record.titleTypeName: Business School, National Association of Retail Grocers, 1952
record.description: Left to right: Franklin J. Lunding (chief executive, Jewel Tea Company); Mrs. Marie Kiefer (National Association of Retail Grocers secretary); R. Wendell Harrison (vice-president and dean of faculties, University of Chicago); Alvin V. Hokanson (National Association of Retail Grocers vice-president); Charles A. Rovetta (dean of students, School of Business, University of Chicago). [Photograph gift of the Graduate School of Business, May 1965].
record.subject3: University of Chicago. Graduate School of Business
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
